PRESENT VALUE

```{r}
# PROCESSING
calcPresentValue = function (futureValue, rateOfReturn, time) {
  presentValue = futureValue / (1+rateOfReturn)^time
  return (presentValue)
}

# INPUT
ans = calcPresentValue (10057, 0.15, 5)
# futureValue = 10057
# rateOfReturn = 0.15
# time = 5

# OUTPUT
print (ans)

```
